FuncDef: The display paf command displays information about a PAF file in the system.

ParaDef.Info:
Detailed information about PAF(Product Adaptive File).
-

Examples: SPEC_FUNC_RAAS_ENABLED        0                    Raas funcation switch(0: disable, 1: enable)
SPEC_MAX_VTY_NUM              21                   Max number of VTY supported
Description  : Raas funcation switch(1: enable, 0: disable)
Description  : Max number of VTY supported
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A PAF file effectively controls product features or resources to be used. To view information about all the specifications configured in the PAF file, run the display paf command.
